EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ram, My name is Sara Conde and I received your contact information from Steve Arhancet. From this point on I’ll be your main point of contact at MBO. Steve has brought me up to speed on your background but if you would like to set up a time to chat you may go here. I look forward to workign with you! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: R [mailto:vikuntam@yahoo.com] <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS> Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2012 2:56 PM To: Steve Arhancet Cc: Raj Marpu Subject: Fw: MBO Partners / Ram Vikuntam Hello Steve,If you are in Herndon, VA office, we would like to come meet with you about our new future contract work as you may be able to help us. Anytime this week after 4:00 or 5:00 PM is fine. Initial meeting should not take more than 20 minutes of your time. Please let us know if you can spare some time. Thanks-ram732-801-4708 From: Steve Arhancet [mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Tuesday, May 01, 2012 9:45 AM To: vikuntam@yahoo.com <mailto:vikuntam@yahoo.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Ram Vikuntam Dear Ram,We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy, I wanted to personally reach out and offer any assistance I can to help you find the answers you might be looking for. If you would like to chat, you may easily book a time convenient for you in my online schedule by going here https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC.Regards,Steven___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6011f: 703.793.6081e: sarhancet@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com <https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC>
